text: Volunteers is a 1985 American comedy movie directed by Nicholas Meyer and starred Tom Hanks, John Candy, Rita Wilson, Gedde Watanabe, Allan Arbus. It was distributed by TriStar Pictures. ==Other websites== *Volunteers at IMDb Category:1985 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Nicholas Meyer Category:Movies set in Thailand Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: Volunteers (1985 movie)
